name: regex_automata::dfa::dense::{impl#15}::write_to_len
doc:
/// Returns the number of bytes the serialized form of this transition
/// table will use.

cond_chains.ret:
size_of::<u32>()   // state length
        + size_of::<u32>() // stride2
        + self.classes.write_to_len()
        + (self.table().len() * StateID::SIZE)
